This repository contains the code, materials, and documentation for maintaining the NIH Adolescent Brain Cognitive Data (ABCD) data within the QMER Data Center. 
It does not contain materials related to specific projects
This repository does not contain the ABCD data, which requires application for access. 
See www.nda.nih.gov/abcd for more information.
